credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Palace Hall
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
description: Horizontal rectangle. At right and at left are entrance bays with stairs leading to the hall. They are flanked by pedestals with groups upon them. The lateral walls are decorated with colonnades. Stairs are leading in the rear to an archway, giving access to a circular hall with a cupola. On the reverse some architectural sketching.
name: Drawing
